on reading compounds: 先端【センタン】pointed end, tip, point, cusp (of a leaf, crescent moon, etc.), apex (of a curve), forefront, vanguard, spearhead, leading edge
先鋭【センエイ】radical, acute, sharp
肺尖【ハイセン】pulmonary apex, apex of a lung
刀尖【トウセン】tip of a sword
kun reading compounds: 尖る【とがる】to taper to a point, to become pointed, to become sharp, to look displeased, to look sour, to be on edge, to be touchy
切っ先【きっさき】point (of a sword, etc.), pointed verbal attack
